Header: SF - MLT-organized Christmas Carols Reverberate in Church
Content: Christmas Carols, organized by the Security Forces Headquarters -Mullaittivu (SFHQ-MLT) got underway on Tuesday (18) at the Saint Peter's Church in Mullaittivu with the blessings of church authorities and close coordination of Major General Dushyantha Rajaguru, Commander Security Forces – Mullaittivu (SF-MLT) and Major General Ruwan Wanigasooriya, General   Officer Commanding (GOC) 59 Division. Army choirs and different other choirs in the region presented Carols during this arrangement and the event was packed with a large crowd. Major General Rajaguru was one among the distinguished guests attending the occasion. Religious dignitaries, Mrs. Rupawathie Kethieswaran, District Secretary for Mullaittivu, General Officer Commanding (GOC), 59 Division, Major General  P.R Wanigasooriya, GOC 64 Division Brigadier Jayanath Jayaweera, Brigadier JADP Jayathilake Commander Forward Maintenance Area Mullaittivu. Brigadier General Staff SF- MLT, Mr R Ramesh Kumar, Divisional Secretary – Oddusudan, Mr I Prathapan  Divisional Secretary – Matarampattu, N.M Pradeepan Divisional Secretary – Puthukuduirippu Brigade Commanders, Mr. R.P Senanayake Superintendent of Police Mullaittivu District, Sisters in the church  and civilians  attended the event.
